name: Inspirited
summary: Inspirited is a fantasy adventure visual novel with RPG elements! The story has several different endings with five different girls. The demo for Inspirited was completed for Yuri Game Jam 2016 and is available for download! The full release date is tentative, but you can definitely expect the full release in 2017.
info:
• 平台: Windows
  • 平台: MAC OS X
